title: Increase the Width of Confidence Interval
question_text:
Here is the formula used for constructing a confidence interval for the slope of a regression model:
$$b\pm t^{*} (SE_{b})$$

Suppose you are told that you need to increase the width of a confidence interval. All of the following answers will accomplish this except:

choices.text:
Increase the value of
